q.quote: A friend is someone who gives you total freedom to be yourself.
q.author: Jim Morrison

q.quote: Education is the movement from darkness to light.
q.author: Allan Bloom

q.quote: Thank God men cannot fly, and lay waste the sky as well as the earth.
q.author: Jim Morrison

q.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
q.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

q.quote: Courage is fire, and bullying is smoke.
q.author: Benjamin Disraeli

q.quote: To travel is to take a journey into yourself.
q.author: Danny Kaye

q.quote: May the forces of evil become confused on the way to your house.
q.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

q.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
q.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

q.quote: The family is one of nature's masterpieces.
q.author: George Santayana

q.quote: Real magic in relationships means an absence of judgment of others.
q.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

q.quote: Men always want to be a woman's first love - women like to be a man's last romance.
q.author: Oscar Wilde

q.quote: For life and death are one, even as the river and the sea are one.
q.author: Oscar Wilde

q.quote: Perseverance is the hard work you do after you get tired of doing the hard work you already did.
q.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

q.quote: Men always want to be a woman's first love - women like to be a man's last romance.
q.author: Oscar Wilde

q.quote: Faith is taking the first step even when you don't see the whole staircase.
